items.fromString:
The Hall of Entities is a critical component of our platform, designed to centralize and streamline the navigation and management of workspaces and organizations across all products. This epic is the first milestone in delivering the Hall of Entities microfrontend, focusing on implementing the new UI design and integrating with existing backend APIs. This version will not involve any new or modified APIs; instead, it will work with the current API setup to ensure a smooth transition and provide immediate value.

As part of this milestone, we will develop several new front-end components that align with the updated design system. These components will include lists of workspaces and organizations, search functionality, pagination, and more action buttons. The goal is to lay a strong foundation for future enhancements that will include handling implicit and explicit organizations, product-specific contract views, and advanced editing capabilities.
items.toString:
The *Hall of Entities* is a new component of our platform, designed to centralize and streamline the navigation and management of workspaces and organizations across all products. This epic is the{color:#ff5630} {color}first milestone in delivering the Hall of Entities microfrontend, focusing on implementing {color:#ff5630}*the new UI design and integrating with existing backend APIs*{color}. 

{color:#ff5630}*This version will not involve any new or modified APIs;*{color} instead, it will work with the current API setup to ensure a smooth transition and provide immediate value.

As part of this milestone, we will develop several new front-end components that align with the updated design system. These components will include lists of workspaces and organizations, search functionality, pagination, and more action buttons. The goal is to lay a strong foundation for future enhancements that will include handling implicit and explicit organizations, product-specific contract views, and advanced editing capabilities.

fields.summary: [FE] Deliver initial Hall of Entities microfrontend using current APIs, focusing on UI and design system
